about_the_game:
Demo available!

This is our first game so we want to let as many people try it as possible, but if you enjoy it feel free to support us by buying the game! The demo gives you access to 3 characters and lets you try the game before you buy. Please give it a try and if you have any issues or feedback contact us!

Knock back and knock out opponents

Fight and launch your opponents around the arena. As you deal damage your opponents will get knocked back further and faster. Position yourself and aim your attacks to knock your opponents out of the ring. In the Bash game mode knock opponents into parts of the environment that have been corrupted by magic to knock them out. 

Tag team fighting

Create a team of three characters that can be swapped to mid combo. Strategically create a team, pick characters that cover each others weaknesses, or play to each others strengths.

Brawl and Bash

Fight against 3 other players and many enemies to get loot that powers you up in this unique 4 player free-for-all throughout the city.

name: Brawlers of Duality

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7-8550U 1.8ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX150
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10870H CPU @ 2.20GHz 2.21 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Brawlers of Duality is a top-down arena fighter where damaging enemies launches them harder. Launch enemies out of the arena to defeat them using martial arts, magic and technology. Battle in 1v1, 2v2, and a free for all mode where you defeat enemies to power up and take on other players.
